name: Starship S.P.R.I.N.G.
description:
Control two halves of a spaceship joined by a deadly electrified spring

Instructions
  • Use WASD and IJKL or left and right stick to steer the halves separately.
  • Tear enemies apart using your spring.
  • The circle at the bottom is your split health bar
Credits
  • I made all assets myself :)
  • Music created using BeepBox:
    • Menu theme
    • Battle theme
  • Sound effects generated with Leshy SFMaker
  • Third-party packages used:
    • LeanTween
